program.name: RealPlayer-INTL-OLFA-Non Incent
program.description: Offer Review:&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>Download videos 3X faster from video websites<br>Watch your PC videos on your TV wirelessly<br>Access to all RealPlayer Cloud premium features - $50 value<br>+100GB of personal video cloud storage<br><br>Affiliate Benefits:&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>Higher rates available for high-performing affiliates, at the advertiser's discretion.<br><br>User Flow:&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>1. User gets to the sign up page.<br>2. User needs to create an account (First name, Last name, Email, Password and accept t&amp;c)<br>3. User needs to enter his payments details.<br>4. User confirms the $1.99 payment for the service.<br>5. The user is subscribed and the conversion occurs.<br><br>Typical Demographics:&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>ALL
program.restrictions: OLFA offer - web&amp;mobile traffic from same link.<br>traffic from WW is accepted excluding Russia. <br>GDN/SEM:<br>In order to run this offer with Adwords, please contact your account manager<br>
